name: Escaping nightmare
description:
Sleep, the rest for many but not for our protagonist who in his dreams escapes for survival. Desperately he avoids the clutches of dead but it's for naught, the monster is one that never tires and never sleeps.

Credits:

Lucio Beltran - Programming

Luke Hardisty - Music

Created with art assets from :

FALL-O-Ween 2020 Art Kit by Frecklebars - https://frecklebars.itch.io/gdsjam20-kit

8-Directional GameBoy Character Template by GybonGL - https://gibbongl.itch.io/8-directional-gameboy-character-template

Fall-O-Ween 2020 Art Kit
